turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order me a pizza please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What restaurant would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order it from Pizza Hut please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a large pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings would you like on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pork sausage and green pepper please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get hand tossed please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have your order as a large hand tossed pork sausage and green pepper pizza. Is that correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I will order it now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizza will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A receipt will be sent to you via text on your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thanks.
